pages.text: Since the Jade Vines are notorious for it's restorative properties, no wonder these effects translate perfectly when distilled and fermented.$(br)And in contrast to the overpowering bitterness of the bulbs themselves, fermenting them with a good share of petals brings out a much more sweet and slightly sour taste instead, complimented with earthy undertones - almost resembling wine, but in trademark jade color.

pages.title: Titration Recipe
pages.text: The longer the fermentation goes on, the stronger the taste gets, albeit you will have to pay a small Angel's Share
